basicQuest.title: Spot a Bird
basicQuest.instructions:
Birds are messengers of freedom, motion, and the moment. Taking time to notice one â€” even for a few seconds â€” is an invitation to pause and breathe with nature.

Look up, look around, and listen. There's always a bird somewhere if you're still enough to see it.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a bird perched or flying outdoors
